SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL

FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

    ELSE NULL

    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL

FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[IsRead], [t].[c], [t].[DateAdd], [t].[c0], [t].[Genre], [t].[CoverUrl], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

    ELSE NULL

    ELSE NULL

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]

    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[IsRead], [t].[c], [t].[DateAdd], [t].[c0], [t].[Genre], [t].[CoverUrl], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

2024-05-16 09:05:42.425 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

        ELSE NULL

    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0

    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]

    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

    ELSE NULL

    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[IsRead], [t].[c], [t].[DateAdd], [t].[c0], [t].[Genre], [t].[CoverUrl], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

    ELSE NULL

    ELSE NULL

2024-05-16 09:31:01.837 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[IsRead], [t].[c], [t].[DateAdd], [t].[c0], [t].[Genre], [t].[CoverUrl], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

2024-05-16 09:51:32.825 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[IsRead], [t].[c], [t].[DateAdd], [t].[c0], [t].[Genre], [t].[CoverUrl], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[IsRead], [t].[c], [t].[DateAdd], [t].[c0], [t].[Genre], [t].[CoverUrl], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]

    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL

    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

2024-05-16 10:05:05.812 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (14ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[IsRead], [t].[c], [t].[DateAdd], [t].[c0], [t].[Genre], [t].[CoverUrl], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

2024-05-16 10:06:24.423 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]
2024-05-16 10:06:24.426 +07:00 [INF] Executing OkObjectResult, writing value of type 'System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[BookPublisher.Models.DTO.BookWithAuthorAndPublisherDTO, BookPublisher, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]]'.

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL

    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[IsRead], [t].[c], [t].[DateAdd], [t].[c0], [t].[Genre], [t].[CoverUrl], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Title], [t].[Description], [t].[IsRead], [t].[c], [t].[DateAdd], [t].[c0], [t].[Genre], [t].[CoverUrl], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c], [b].[DateAdd], CASE
        WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
        ELSE NULL
    END AS [c0], [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [books] AS [b]
    LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
    WHERE [b].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[idbook]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t].[Id0], [t0].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL

FROM [books] AS [b]

    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]

) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Title], [b].[Description], [b].[IsRead], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[DateRead]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[DateAdd], CASE
    WHEN [b].[IsRead] = CAST(1 AS bit) THEN [b].[Rate]
    ELSE NULL
END, [b].[Genre], [b].[CoverUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id], [t].[Id0]
FROM [books] AS [b]
LEFT JOIN [publishers] AS [p] ON [b].[PublisherId] = [p].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Name], [b0].[Id], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[idbook]
    FROM [book_authors] AS [b0]
    LEFT JOIN [author] AS [a] ON [b0].[idauthor] = [a].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [b].[Id] = [t].[idbook]
ORDER BY [b].[Id], [p].[Id], [t].[Id]
